name: ART Baseline
description: Baseline indicators for clients starting antiretroviral therapy (ART), including demographics, CD4 results, TB screening and prophylaxis at initiation.

name: ART Monthly
description: Monthly ART service indicators covering initiation, follow-up care, routine monitoring and service uptake.

name: ART Outcome
description: ART outcome indicators covering retention, transfers, mortality and other treatment outcomes.

name: Child and Nutrition
description: Child health and nutrition indicators covering priority conditions, growth and nutrition screening, and related outcomes.

name: Communicable Diseases
description: Indicators for priority communicable diseases, including service delivery and key outcomes.

name: DR-TB Quarterly
description: Quarterly indicators for drug-resistant TB case management, monitoring and outcomes.

name: DS-TB Quarterly
description: Quarterly indicators for drug-sensitive TB treatment monitoring and outcomes.

name: EMS
description: Emergency Medical Services indicators covering dispatch, response and patient transport activity.

name: EPI
description: Routine immunisation indicators covering doses given and vaccination coverage.

name: EPI Campaign
description: Campaign immunisation indicators for targeted vaccination drives and catch-up activities.

name: Environmental & Port Health
description: Environmental and port health indicators covering inspections, compliance monitoring and public health controls.

name: Eye Care
description: Eye care service indicators including screening, consultations and procedures.

name: HIV
description: HIV programme indicators covering testing, positivity and key prevention/service measures.

name: Inpatient Management
description: Inpatient service indicators including separations, bed utilisation and key outcomes.

name: Management PHC
description: PHC management indicators covering catchment/referral flows and facility operations.

name: Maternal and Neonatal
description: Maternal and newborn health indicators including ANC, deliveries and neonatal outcomes.

name: Mental Health
description: Mental health service indicators including consultations, admissions and follow-up care.

name: Non-Communicable Disease
description: NCD indicators covering screening, diagnosis, treatment monitoring and outcomes.

name: Oral Health
description: Oral health indicators covering dental service delivery and prevention activities.

name: Quality
description: Quality-of-care indicators supporting audit, performance monitoring and service improvement.

name: Rehabilitation
description: Rehabilitation indicators covering therapy service delivery and patient support activities.

name: School Health
description: School health indicators covering screening and health services delivered in schools.

name: STI
description: Sexually transmitted infection indicators covering screening, diagnosis and treatment services.

name: TB Monthly
description: Monthly TB indicators supporting routine monitoring of services, treatment and outcomes.

name: Viral Hepatitis
description: Viral hepatitis indicators covering screening, diagnosis and treatment monitoring.

name: WBPHCOT
description: WBPHCOT indicators covering household/community services, screening and referral activities.

name: Women's Health
description: Womenâ€™s health indicators covering priority services across reproductive and related health programmes.
